lead_paragraph: LAFER--Norma, 80, formerly of Parsippany, NJ, passed away peacefully on February 12, 2016 in Boca Raton, Florida. Norma, daughter of Jack and Clara Rosen, was born in NYC on September 22, 1935. She was raised in the Bronx, and moved to Long Island before marrying David Lafer, and moving to New Jersey. She attended Hunter College in NYC, and ultimately graduated Cum Laude from William Paterson College in New Jersey. Norma was the business partner in Linders French Cleaners, in Bernardsville, New Jersey along with her husband David. They retired to the Polo Club in Boca Raton, Florida in 1998. Norma is survived by her husband of 60 years, David; daughter Jamie of Santa Monica, CA, son Jason and wife Stacey of Basking Ridge, NJ and their children, Georgie and Ava; sister Mona Abrams of Boynton Beach, Florida and nieces Nicole, Lauren, Sherri and Joan. 1/3
